verses.verse: And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2398>sin,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H423>swearing,<s%> and is a <S%H5707>witness,<s%> <S%H176>whether<s%> he has <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> of it; <S%H518>if<s%> he do not <S%H5046>utter<s%> it, then he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> <S%H176>whether<s%> it be a <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H2416>beast,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>cattle,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H8318>creeping<s%> things, and if it be <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from him; he also shall be <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> and <S%H816>guilty.<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> he <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> it be that a man shall be <S%H2930>defiled<s%> with, and it be <S%H5956>hid<s%> from him; when he <S%H3045>knows<s%> of it, then he shall be <S%H816>guilty.<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H981>pronouncing<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to do <S%H3190>good,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> it be that a <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H981>pronounce<s%> with an <S%H7621>oath,<s%> and it be <S%H5956>hid<s%> from him; when he <S%H3045>knows<s%> of it, then he shall be <S%H816>guilty<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H428>these.<s%>
And it shall be, <S%H3588>when<s%> he shall be <S%H816>guilty<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> things, that he shall <S%H3034>confess<s%> that he has <S%H2398>sinned<s%> in that thing:

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H817>trespass<s%> <S%H817>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> a <S%H5347>female<s%> from the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> a <S%H3776>lamb<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H8166>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him concerning his <S%H2403>sin.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he be not <S%H5060>able<s%> <S%H1767><s%> to <S%H5060>bring<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> then he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> for his <S%H817>trespass,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> them to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> who shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> is for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering <S%H7223>first,<s%> and <S%H4454>wring<s%> off his <S%H7218>head<s%> from his <S%H6203>neck,<s%> but shall not <S%H914>divide<s%> it asunder:

And he shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering on the <S%H7023>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and the <S%H7604>rest<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be <S%H4680>wrung<s%> out <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> it is a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

And he shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, according to the <S%H4941>manner:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him for his <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

But <S%H518>if<s%> he be not <S%H5381>able<s%> to <S%H5381>bring<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> then he that <S%H2398>sinned<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> for his <S%H7133>offering<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering; he shall <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on it, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H5414>put<s%> any <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> <S%H5921>thereon:<s%> for it is a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

Then shall he <S%H935>bring<s%> it to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7061>take<s%> his <S%H4393>handful<s%> <S%H7062><s%> of it, <S%H853>even<s%> a <S%H234>memorial<s%> thereof, and <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the offerings made by fire to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> it is a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him as <S%H5921>touching<s%> his <S%H2403>sin<s%> that he has <S%H2398>sinned<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H428>these,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him: and the remnant shall be the <S%H3548>priest's,<s%> as a meat <S%H4503>offering.<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass,<s%> and <S%H2398>sin<s%> through <S%H7684>ignorance,<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> things of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> then he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> for his <S%H817>trespass<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> with your <S%H6187>estimation<s%> by <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> for a <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering.

And he shall make <S%H7999>amends<s%> for the <S%H2398>harm<s%> that he has done in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> thing, and shall <S%H3254>add<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part <S%H5921>thereto,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the <S%H3548>priest:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him with the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering, and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2398>sin,<s%> and <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of these things <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H3808>forbidden<s%> to be <S%H6213>done<s%> by the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> though he <S%H3045>knew<s%> it not, yet is he <S%H816>guilty,<s%> and shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> with your <S%H6187>estimation,<s%> for a <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering, to the <S%H3548>priest:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H5921>concerning<s%> his <S%H7684>ignorance<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> he <S%H7683>erred<s%> and <S%H3045>knew<s%> it not, and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.
It is a <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering: he has certainly <S%H816>trespassed<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
